TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UrlPropertyAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class UrlPropertyAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class UrlPropertyAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 对控件用来标识包含 URL 值的字符串属性的特性进行定义。

span.span: Defines the attribute that controls use to identify string properties containing URL values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性是一个应用于表示 URL 的控件属性的属性。The attribute is an attribute applied to a control property that represents a URL. 除了将标记为表示 URL 的字符串属性属性定义标识可以用于筛选属性的特定文件类型的属性。In addition to marking a string property as representing a URL, the attribute defines the property that identifies specific file types that can be used to filter against the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个 URL 特定的属性的类。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此代码示例中，特性应用于`TargetUrl`属性`CustomHyperLinkControl`类。In this code example, a attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 属性可设置 ASP.NET 文件的特定文件筛选器。The attribute sets a specific file filter for ASP.NET files. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新默认实例。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实例类初始化与属性设置为值"*。\*"。A default instance of the class is initialized with the property set to the value "*.\*". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个 URL 特定的属性的类。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此代码示例中，默认特性应用于`TargetUrl`属性`CustomHyperLinkControl`类。In this code example, a default attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 该属性指示支持所有的 URL 类型，并指定一个默认文件筛选器设置为"*。\*".The attribute indicates support for all URL types and specifies a default file filter set to "*.\*". [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#1)]

param.span: 与 URL 特定属性关联的文件筛选器。

span.span: A file filter associated with the URL-specific property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，将 属性设置为指定的字符串。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the property to the specified string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例类创建使用此构造函数初始化与属性设置为`filter`。An instance of a class created with this constructor is initialized with the property set to `filter`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一个 URL 特定的属性的类。The following code example demonstrates a class that implements a URL-specific property. 在此代码示例中，特性应用于`TargetUrl`属性`CustomHyperLinkControl`类。In this code example, a attribute is applied to the `TargetUrl` property of the `CustomHyperLinkControl` class. 属性可设置 ASP.NET 文件的特定文件筛选器。The attribute sets a specific file filter for ASP.NET files. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/CS/CustomHyperLinkControl.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.UrlPropertyAttribute/VB/CustomHyperLinkControl.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Filter As String
public: property System::String ^ Filter { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与 URL 特定属性关联的文件筛选器。

span.span: Gets a file filter associated with the URL-specific property.

value.span: 与 URL 特定属性关联的文件筛选器。

span.span: A file filter associated with the URL-specific property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计器中筛选器提供文件选择器基于属性。A designer provides a filter in file selectors based on the attribute. 默认情况下，它被初始化为"*。\*"，它指定文件扩展名的所有文件。By default, it is initialized to "*.\*", which specifies all files with a file extension. 你可以为更具体的文件类型; 设置筛选器例如，筛选器"\*.aspx"指示仅 ASP.NET 文件由特定 URL 的属性。You can set the filter for more specific file types; for example, the filter "\*.aspx" indicates that only ASP.NET files are represented by the URL-specific property.
